title: can't gift to friend

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I was trying to gift a friend Xayah / Rakan, they are on my friends list (new friend) but I don't see them in the gifting center. We both tried relogging, and he still doesn't show.

My Poro-brothers, would you be able to help me?

http://imgur.com/6tSgPse

replies.body: Hello friend-of-poros!  There are[ a few requirements ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)before gifting becomes eligible.  Looking into this for you, it doesn't look like the option to gift that friend is currently available.  Due to the nature of sensitive account information, I can't really offer context on why here.  :/  If you have questions, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get back to you.
